perturbation.original_text:
During the Distribution Term, and in addition to the consideration provided pursuant to
Sections 6.1, 6.2, 6.3, and 6.4, for all Product supplied by Zogenix to Distributor under purchase orders submitted pursuant to the
Supply Agreement in a particular Fiscal Year, Distributor shall pay to Zogenix a transfer price per unit of Product supplied (the
“Transfer Price”) equal to the sum of (i) [***] of the Fully-Burdened Manufacturing Cost per unit of Product for such Fiscal
Year, (ii) [***] of aggregate annual Net Sales for such Fiscal Year, and (iii) the applicable markup percent of the applicable
aggregate Net Price for such Fiscal Year, which markup percent is determined based on the incremental amount of Product
ordered in such Fiscal Year as set forth below, as may be adjusted pursuant to Section 6.5(b):

Amount of Product Supplied per Fiscal Year
Net Price Markup
For the portion of Product supplied less than or equal to the equivalent of [***] in Net Sales in
such Fiscal Year
[***]
For the portion of Product supplied in excess of the equivalent of [***] in Net Sales and less
than or equal to the equivalent of [***] in Net Sales in such Fiscal Year
[***]
For the portion of Product supplied in excess of the equivalent of [***] in Net Sales and less
than or equal to the equivalent of [***] in Net Sales in such Fiscal Year
[***]
For the portion of Product supplied in excess of the equivalent of [***] in Net Sales in such
Fiscal Year
[***]

The Net Sales equivalent described in the left column of the table above is calculated by determining the total number of units
ordered in the applicable Fiscal Year and multiplying such number by the Net Price for such Fiscal Year.
Following the expiration of the Distribution Term and during the remaining Term of this Agreement, for all Product supplied by
Zogenix to Distributor under purchase orders submitted pursuant to the Supply Agreement in a particular Fiscal Year, Distributor
shall pay to Zogenix the Transfer Price per unit of Product supplied shall be equal to the sum of (i) [***] of the Fully-Burdened
Manufacturing Cost per unit of Product for such Fiscal Year, and (ii) [***] of aggregate annual Net Sales for such Fiscal Year.
perturbation.changed_text:
During the Distribution Term, and in addition to the consideration provided pursuant to
Sections 6.1, 6.2, 6.3, and 6.4, for all Product supplied by Zogenix to Distributor under purchase orders submitted pursuant to the
Supply Agreement in a particular Fiscal Year, Distributor shall pay to Zogenix a transfer price per unit of Product supplied (the
“Transfer Price”) equal to the sum of (i) [***] of the Fully-Burdened Manufacturing Cost per unit of Product for such Fiscal
Year, (ii) [***] of aggregate annual Net Sales for such Fiscal Year, and (iii) the applicable markup percent of the applicable
aggregate Net Price for such Fiscal Year, which markup percent is determined based on the incremental amount of Product
ordered in such Fiscal Year as set forth below, as may be adjusted pursuant to Section 6.5(b):

Amount of Product Supplied per Fiscal Year
Net Price Markup
For the portion of Product supplied less than or equal to the equivalent of [***] in Net Sales in
such Fiscal Year
[***]
For the portion of Product supplied in excess of the equivalent of [***] in Net Sales and less
than or equal to the equivalent of [***] in Net Sales in such Fiscal Year
[***]
For the portion of Product supplied in excess of the equivalent of [***] in Net Sales and less
than or equal to the equivalent of [***] in Net Sales in such Fiscal Year
[***]
For the portion of Product supplied in excess of the equivalent of [***] in Net Sales in such
Fiscal Year
[***]

The Net Sales equivalent described in the left column of the table above is calculated by determining the total number of units
ordered in the applicable Fiscal Year and multiplying such number by the Net Price for such Fiscal Year.
Following the expiration of the Distribution Term and during the remaining Term of this Agreement, for all Product supplied by
Zogenix to Distributor under purchase orders submitted pursuant to the Supply Agreement in a particular Fiscal Year, Distributor
shall pay to Zogenix the Transfer Price per unit of Product supplied shall be equal to (i) [***] of aggregate annual Net Sales for such Fiscal Year.
perturbation.explanation: The original text provides a clear calculation for the transfer price during the distribution term and a different calculation *after* the distribution term. The modification removes the Fully-Burdened Manufacturing Cost component from the calculation of the transfer price *after* the distribution term, but *only* mentions the net sales and not the manufacturing cost, creates a conflict and ambiguity. It could be argued that both apply or only one, but uncertainty in enforcement is very present.

perturbation.original_text:
All payments under this Agreement shall be made by bank wire transfer in immediately available
funds to an account designated in writing by the payee Party or by such other means as directed by such Party in writing. Payments
hereunder will be considered to be made as of the day on which they are received by the payee Party’s designated bank.
perturbation.changed_text:
All payments under this Agreement shall be made by bank wire transfer in immediately available
funds to an account designated in writing by the payee Party. Payments
hereunder will be considered to be made as of the day on which they are initiated by the payor Party.
perturbation.explanation: The original text states payments are considered made when *received* by the payee's bank. The modified text states payments are considered made when *initiated* by the payor. This creates a direct conflict about when a payment is officially considered complete, which is crucial for determining late fees, compliance with deadlines, and potential breach of contract.

perturbation.original_text:
In the event that any payment due under this Agreement or the Supply Agreement is not made when
due, the payment shall accrue interest from the date due at a rate per annum equal to [***] above the U.S. Prime Rate (as set
forth in The Wall Street Journal, Eastern U.S. Edition) for the date on which payment was due, calculated daily on the basis of a
365-day year, or similar reputable data source; provided that in no event shall such rate exceed the maximum legal annual interest
rate. The payment of such interest shall not limit a Party from exercising any other rights it may have as a consequence of the
lateness of any payment.
perturbation.changed_text:
In the event that any payment due under this Agreement or the Supply Agreement is not made when
due, the payment shall accrue interest from thirty (30) days after the date due at a rate per annum equal to [***] above the U.S. Prime Rate (as set
forth in The Wall Street Journal, Eastern U.S. Edition) for the date on which payment was due, calculated daily on the basis of a
365-day year, or similar reputable data source; provided that in no event shall such rate exceed the maximum legal annual interest
rate. The payment of such interest shall not limit a Party from exercising any other rights it may have as a consequence of the
lateness of any payment.
perturbation.explanation: The original text states that interest accrues from the date payment is due. The modified text says interest accrues from *thirty (30) days after* the date payment is due. This clearly contradicts the original term about when interest begins to accrue, leading to disputes about how and when late fees are applied.
